price: 26. Dheh: Alle baa aad u ogsoon intay negaadeen, isagaa u (cilmi leh) waxaalaha aan muuqan ee jira samooyinka iyo arlada, arki ogaa oo maqli ogaa (wax walba). Ma ay laha gargaare aan Isaga aheyn, lamana wadaajiyo Xukunkiisa axadna.
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا لَبِثُواْۖ لَهُۥ غَيۡبُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ أَبۡصِرۡ بِهِۦ وَأَسۡمِعۡۚ مَا لَهُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا يُشۡرِكُ فِي حُكۡمِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: quli al-lahu aʿlamu bimā labithū lahu ghaybu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi abṣir bihi wa-asmiʿ mā lahum min dūnihi min waliyyin walā yush'riku fī ḥuk'mihi aḥadan
